Invocation Name: d. w. radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bold, rational, just – are you armored for The Truth?

Die Waarheid Radio offers our listeners a variety of Afrikaans programs for both young and old.

We also discuss relevant and/or difficult topics that are often swept under the rug through our radio channel and podcast material.

Our policy is 'THE TRUTH.' Come join us, in Afrikaans, and become part of our community.
